# mcmcr

## Introduction

`mcmcr` is an R package to manipulate Monte Carlo Markov Chain samples.

## Utilisation

```{r}
library(mcmcr)

mcmcr <- mcmcr:::mcmcr

nchains(mcmcr)
niters(mcmcr)
parameters(mcmcr)
nterms(mcmcr)

coef(mcmcr)
rhat(mcmcr)

estimates(mcmcr)

plot(mcmcr[[1]])
```

## Installation

To install the latest version from GitHub
```
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/mcmcr")
```
